UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's public profile information.

uid.description: The user's unique ID from Firebase Authentication.

photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

friends.description: An array of UIDs of the user's friends.

isOnline.description: Whether the user is currently online.

lastSeen.description: The last time the user was seen online.

blockedUsers.description: An array of UIDs of users that this user has blocked.

blockedBy.description: An array of UIDs of users who have blocked this user.

chatsCleared.description: A map of chatId to the timestamp when the user cleared the chat.

verifiedBadge.description: Settings for the user's verified badge.

showBadge.description: Whether to show the verified badge.

badgeColor.description: The color of the verified badge.

colorfulName.description: Whether to display the user's name with a colorful gradient animation.

FriendRequest.title: Friend Request
FriendRequest.description: Represents a friend request from one user to another.

senderId.description: The UID of the user who sent the request.

receiverId.description: The UID of the user who received the request.

status.description: The status of the friend request.

Chat.title: Chat Room
Chat.description: Represents a conversation between two or more users.

members.description: An array of user UIDs who are part of the chat.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the chat was created.

typing.description: A map of userId to a boolean indicating if the user is typing.

Message.title: Chat Message
Message.description: Represents a single message within a chat.

senderId.description: The UID of the user who sent the message.

content.description: The text content of the message.

timestamp.description: The timestamp when the message was sent.

Call.title: Call Record
Call.description: Represents a record of a voice or video call.

callerId.description: The UID of the user who initiated the call.

receiverId.description: The UID of the user who received the call.

participants.description: An array containing the UIDs of both the caller and the receiver.

status.description: The status of the call from the perspective of one user.

direction.description: The direction of the call for the user viewing the history.

timestamp.description: The timestamp when the call was initiated.

duration.description: Duration of the call in seconds (if answered).

DeletedUser.title: Deleted User
DeletedUser.description: Represents a user who has deleted their account, storing their email to prevent re-registration.

email.description: The email of the deleted user.

deletedAt.description: The timestamp when the user was deleted.

/friendRequests/{requestId}.description: Stores all friend requests between users.

/chats/{chatId}/messages/{messageId}.description: Sub-collection for messages within a specific chat.

/calls/{callId}.description: Stores all call records between users.

/deletedUsers/{email}.description: Stores the emails of users who have deleted their accounts to prevent re-registration.
